All Classes

Class Description
AIHandler
This class controls AI behaviour.
AIIF  
AISnake
A subclass of Snake which retrieves ai movements from the ai handler
AStarFinder
An A Star path finding class, which uses A Star pathfinding with an A Star Heuristic to find the shortest path on a grid graph
AStarHeuristic
An A Star Heuristic, using modified manhattan distance
AudioController
Handles sound effects and music
AudioSettings  
BoxStatus
A status representing the current type of square on the map
BuildAMap
A map building class allowing a user to click on squares to build a map, then save it to a file
Client
A class which enables a user to connect to a running server, through the use of a socket.
ControlsInverter
A powerup which inverts controls of a player
Coordinate
A class representing an x, y coordinate and it's walkable status (Used for AI)
Difficulty
An enum representing the selected AI difficulty
Direction
Enum class used to hold cardinal directions
EndScreen  
FileHandler
Handles read and write operations to the data file
FileHandler2
Handles read and write operations to the data file
Finder
Pathfinding superclass
FinderIF  
Freeze
A powerup which freezes a player temporarily
Fruit
A class representing a fruit object
GameConstants
Interface used to store constants relating to the game behaviour
Heuristic
Heuristic Super Class
Logger
A custom logger to print formatted information to the console
LongestPathFinder
A longest path finding class, which uses a custom heuristic to find a sufficiently long path on a grid graph
LongPathHeuristic
A longest path heuristic class
MainClient  
MainMenu
The main menu of the application
Map
This class holds the status of the map, as well as it's dimensions and selected skin
MapImageLoadException
Exception class handling errors when loading a map image
MapManager
A class that retrieves all maps from the default path and constructs Map tempnetworkingobjects from them.
MapSkin
A containing class to hold images for the different box skins used in the game
MapSkinManager
A class that retrieves all skins from the default path and constructs MapSkin tempnetworkingobjects from them.
Mine
A powerup which allows a player to drop a mine
MultiPlayer
The MultiPlayer class is responsible for handling actions made on the MultiPlayer UI, as well as starting the server and clients.
MultiplayerPowerUp
A class to manage powerups
NetworkingConstants
Interface used to store networking constants
Node
A node representing a grid square.
NodeGrid
A node representation of a 2d grid.
NoPathFoundException
Exception class used when no path is found on a NodeGrid
PathConstants
Interface used to store path constants (e.g /client/src/main/...)
PathFindingException
Exception class used when an invalid call to the pathfinding package is called.
PlayerSnake
A subclass of Snake which retrieves ai movements from the ai handler
PowerUp
A class to manage powerups
QueueFinder
A pathfinding superclass which uses a priority queue, open and closed sets to perform pathfinding with a given heuristic
Server
A class which sets up a server allowing two users to connect to it and start the game.
Shop
Class controlling shop rendering and behaviour
Shop2
Class controlling shop rendering and behaviour
SinglePlayer
The main singleplayer class, handling behaviour, rendering, render timing and game updates for the client.
Snake
A superclass controlling snake behaviour
Snake  
SnakeImageLoadException
Exception class handling errors when loading a snake image
SnakeSkin
A containing class to hold images for the different snake skins used in the game
SnakeSkinManager
A class that retrieves all skins from the default path and constructs SnakeSkin tempnetworkingobjects from them.
TorusAStarFinder
An A Star path finding class, which uses A Star pathfinding with an A Star Heuristic to find the shortest path on a grid graph.
TorusAStarHeuristic
An A Star Heuristic, using modified manhattan distance.
Util
Utility class for repetitive functions
Util
A utility class used in the pathfinding package
Wall
A class representing a wall
WallSkipper
A powerup allowing a player to skip through walls
